function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete or no reporting of key data (randomisation, blinding, numerators and denominators, interventions, outcomes, attrition of participants, confidence intervals, cluster coefficients).","Impact":"Loss of information and potential biases, leading to inaccurate conclusions and ineffective interventions.","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough and accurate reporting of all key data in research studies. Provide training and support for researchers to understand the importance of reporting key data.","Technologies":"Research reporting guidelines, data management software, training programs.","People":"Researchers, authors, research institutions.","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Confusion between cohort design and before-and-after design, leading to unsupported conclusions.","Impact":"Inaccurate conclusions and misinterpretation of data, leading to ineffective interventions and wasted resources.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines and training on research design and methodology. Encourage peer review and collaboration to identify and correct design discrepancies.","Technologies":"Research design software, peer review platforms, collaboration tools.","People":"Researchers, authors, reviewers.","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Potential biases such as cash incentives given to participants.","Impact":"Risk of biased data and results, leading to inaccurate conclusions and potentially ineffective interventions.","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines and oversight on participant incentives. Encourage transparency and disclosure of all potential biases in study protocols and reports.","Technologies":"Ethics review software, participant incentive management tools, transparency and disclosure platforms.","People":"Researchers, ethics committees, funding agencies.","Owner":"Research institutions, ethics committees, funding agencies."}]}
